channel.title: [508] Godwars help please [508]
channel.description:
Hi on my 508 i currently have about 45% godwars but i would like to know how do i get the npc's to drop the correct stuff for example getting
general graardor to drop bandos godsword
I would also like to know how i could make all the objects work for example the door's to get into teh chamber's and the grapple and the frozen bridge ect ect ect
Please if anybody could help it would be much appreciated
